lines.text: How much money do you make in a year?
Oh, in a year, I would say anywhere from thirty to eleven thousand a year, sir.
You're fat! My husband was fat. He's dead now. You must eat like a pig!
A pig. Yeah, yeah.
Cigarettes'll kill you. My husband smoked, you know. He died from smoking too much.
I thought you said he died 'cause he was fat!
He was fat, with bad lungs.
Maybe the wedding will help to bring everybody closer together.
[doorbell rings]
Yeah, weddings are like that.

[off-camera]
Misty... your pimp is here to see you!
'Scuse me, I'm looking for a guy named Skipper.
I'm a guy named Skipper.
Damian, take that tablecloth off, will you? It's all bloody. It looks terrible.

[after giving Damian a long list of tasks to do]
Damian, be a dear and get me a coffee.

[off-camera]
I'm only ONE person.

[to half-dressed woman]
You have an acetylene torch in there I could borrow?
I'll just shut the fuck right up.
I know the police out there... with their machine guns and helicopters. Oh, we're going to get blown away! But that's all right... because we're ready to die.
No, we're not.
Can't you read the sign? No seducing in the cafeteria!

[voice in the aerobics class]
Reach for beauty, reach for peace, reach for money and success! And stretch! Stretch!
I am your world, John.
Okay, I'll buy that.
You'll even kill your future father-in-law!
Okay. Why not.
That's not a killer. That's a schmuck!
That irresponsible bastard! I'm going to kill him!
Please, Mr. Reese, this is a house of worship.
Oh, for god's sake!
Let's consummate the marriage now! Dive! Dive! It's hickey time!
I'd like to talk about my dick. It's this wide!
[stretches out his hands]
Who's Dick?
There's only one way to cure that.
What's that?
To drop him on his fucking head.

[Holding John over a ledge]
You see that Pinto?
[nods to car]
That's my target.
Now what are you going to say to her?
I'm going to take your advice. I'm going to sit her down. Look her in the eyes. And lie my ass off.
Always works, Johnny.
My fiancee. The greatest lady in bed you'll ever want to meet.
This is a special song I'm going to sing with my dick in my hand. For you, honey.
Beaver, what's wrong? You're covered with blood!

Yeah, I know. It's Wally's blood. See, Wally and I were fixing his bike in the driveway and Dad came home and got real mad. So he took a gun out and killed Wally. Blew his head clean off his shoulders. His face is all over the garage door. It's a real mess.
I set fire to my family.
Whatcha lookin' at, bro?
Hey man, you remember Maurice Walker, the car thief? He dead. Yeah, his old lady threw him down the elevator shaft. That must have happened 3 or 4 years ago, man.
